steps.text: Receive listing lead (referral, website, sphere, cold call, Instagram)
Add lead to Follow Up Boss CRM
Assign lead source and tags in FUB
Initial phone/text/email outreach to seller
Qualify seller: timeline, motivation, price expectations
Confirm property address and ownership
Pull tax records (Mecklenburg County CAMA / Realist)
Pull deed and ownership verification
Run preliminary CMA
Research neighborhood / HOA / deed restrictions
Check for liens, code violations, permits
Identify property type
Note any special circumstances (estate, divorce, relocation, short sale, trust)
Schedule listing appointment + add to Google Calendar
Generate full CMA report with comps
Pull active competing listings in area
Pull recently sold comps (90 days)
Pull expired/withdrawn listings for pricing context
Research days on market trends for the area
Prepare listing presentation (iPad + printed leave-behind)
Customize presentation for specific property
Prepare listing agreement (Form 101)
Prepare WWREA disclosure
Prepare Mineral, Oil & Gas Rights Disclosure
Prepare Professional Services Disclosure
Prepare Residential Property Disclosure (if applicable)
Prepare Lead-Based Paint Addendum (if pre-1978)
Prepare seller net sheet with estimated proceeds
Prepare marketing plan overview for seller
Prepare comparable pricing strategy document
Pack listing appointment kit (forms, presentation, gift)
Research pet names / personal details for rapport
Deliver listing presentation
Walk the property — take notes via AI audio device
Discuss pricing strategy with seller
Discuss timeline and seller's needs
Discuss showing instructions and availability
Discuss any repairs or prep work needed before listing
Sign listing agreement (Exclusive Right to Sell)
Sign WWREA disclosure
Sign Mineral, Oil & Gas Rights Disclosure
Sign Professional Services Disclosure
Sign Residential Property Disclosure (via Seller Shield / SkySlope)
Sign Lead-Based Paint Addendum (if pre-1978)
Collect HOA documents and contacts (if applicable)
Collect keys, garage codes, alarm codes, gate codes
Discuss Coming Soon vs. immediate MLS entry
Set list price
Set target go-live date
Upload all signed documents to Google Drive
Create deal in FUB with correct pipeline stage (WIP/Pre-List)
Update dashboard with new listing
Upload docs to SkySlope + create new SkySlope listing (from MLS)
Send signed documents to Corcoran compliance via SkySlope
Ask Ally if staging is needed for this listing
Order photography + floor plan (group text: Ally + Mike Hellinger)
Ask Ryan if virtual tour / Matterport should be ordered
Email Cameron Glenn's team to schedule video walkthrough
Send calendar invite for photo shoot to clients, Ryan, and Ally
Send property prep email to listing clients + Ally walkthrough if needed
Stage property (if applicable)
Verify square footage against tax records
Pull GIS info / property tax card
Pull Realist report
Pull current property tax bill
Pull plat map (if applicable)
Pull survey (if applicable)
Pull flood plain map (if applicable)
Pull stormwater map (if applicable)
Pull deed restrictions / CCRs / condo declaration (if applicable)
Pull building permit information (if applicable)
Pull septic tank permit (if applicable)
Obtain HOA disclosure and resale certificate (if applicable)
Obtain condo resale statement (if applicable)
Confirm legal description matches deed
Confirm ownership matches listing agreement signers
If trust/estate/POA — obtain operating agreement / trust docs
Request seller to complete Residential Property Disclosure
Review completed disclosure for accuracy
Prepare CMLS Incomplete Agent Full MLS Sheet
Draft MLS listing description / remarks
Review MLS description (Ryan reviews → Jarvis emails seller to sign off)
Research area and property details for key marketing features
Set up lockbox / Supra
Install yard sign
Create property-specific email for inquiries
Create agent prospecting text + email for MLS reverse prospecting
Create single-property website (homes.realtyryan.com/address)
Create printed materials (Jarvis creates → Ally approves → Jarvis sends to printer)
Complete CMLS Coming Soon Authorization Form
Enter listing as Coming Soon in MLS
Share Coming Soon on social media
Send Coming Soon email blast to agent network
Begin pre-marketing to buyer agents
Share in agent Facebook groups / MLS groups
Track Coming Soon inquiries in FUB
Enter full listing in Canopy MLS (Matrix)
Upload all photos in correct order
Upload virtual tour link
Upload floor plan
Verify all MLS fields are accurate
Double-check price, square footage, room counts, lot size
Verify showing instructions are correct
Set up ShowingTime showing instructions
Verify listing appears on realtyryan.com / IDX feed
Send 'Just Listed' email blast to database
Post listing on LinkedIn (Jarvis) + Instagram (Ryan)
Send direct outreach to top buyer agents in area
Notify seller that listing is live — send MLS link
Add listing to Realty Ryan featured properties
Monitor showing activity + text showing agents with property details
Collect and relay showing feedback to seller
Send weekly seller update emails (Mondays)
Monitor competing listings — new, price changes, under contract, sold
Review pricing strategy bi-weekly based on activity
Recommend price adjustment if needed (with data)
Coordinate open houses (if applicable)
Refresh social media marketing monthly (reminder to Ally/Ryan)
Track DOM and advise on strategy
Monitor market conditions (Jarvis drafts → Ryan reviews before sending to sellers)
Field and present all offers (monitor HM email → create email template to seller)
Receive and review offer (Form 2-T)
Present offer to seller with analysis (Jarvis creates → Ryan reviews)
Execute accepted offer — all parties sign
Send executed contract to all parties
Update SkySlope file for compliance review
Update FUB deal stage to Under Contract
Update dashboard status
Calculate and track all contract deadlines + create calendar invites
Confirm receipt of DD fee (Ally notifies → Jarvis uploads DD receipt to SkySlope)
Confirm receipt of earnest money
Coordinate with buyer's agent on inspections
Coordinate seller's response to repair requests
Negotiate repair requests / credits
Monitor appraisal scheduling and results
Handle appraisal issues (if applicable)
Coordinate with closing attorney / title company
Review closing disclosure / settlement statement
Schedule final walkthrough (contact buyer's agent → add to calendar)
Coordinate utility transfers
Confirm seller has moved out / property is ready
Attend closing (or arrange remote closing)
Confirm funds disbursed
Collect keys / lockbox / sign from property
Bring closing gift to closing
Request Google review / testimonial
Send 'Just Sold' marketing (Jarvis creates → Ryan approves)
Update MLS status to Sold
Update FUB deal stage to Closed
Update dashboard status
Archive transaction file in Google Drive
Send final documents to seller
Add to past client drip / sphere nurture campaign
Schedule 30-day check-in
Schedule 6-month check-in
Schedule 1-year anniversary check-in
Add seller's new address to database (if they bought elsewhere)
Send annual home anniversary card
Request referrals
